title: Sheffield Hallam University GREAT Scholarships 2024
eligi: be a citizen of India, Pakistan, or Thailand
have applied for a full-time taught postgraduate course starting in September 2024 at the university
have achieved a minimum 2.1 or its equivalent in their undergraduate honors degree
fulfill the course’s English language and academic entry requirements
have sufficient funds to cover the remaining tuition fee and any additional fees the course may require, for example, field trips
be an international fee-paying student fully financing their studies without external funding (e.g., government, scholarship providers, companies, employers)

title: University of Birmingham India Chancellor's Scholarships 2024-25
eligi: be domiciled in India
have received an offer for a full-time postgraduate programme at the University of Birmingham
meet the academic conditions of their offer to the programme
be classed by the University as an overseas fee payer for tuition fee purposes
be able to pay the outstanding tuition fees not covered under the scholarship

title: Queen's University Belfast GREAT Scholarships 2024
eligi: be a citizen or permanent resident of India
be available to start their academic studies at Queen’s by the start of the academic year in September 2024

meet the eligibility criteria of one of the following programmes: LLM Criminology and Criminal Justice, LLM International Commercial and Business Law, LLM International Human Rights Law, LLM Law, LLM Law and Technology, LLM Intellectual Property Law
have applied for and been offered a full-time place at Queen’s on your selected programme
not have been awarded a full or partial scholarship, studentship, or other government award to complete their studies

title: University of Derby GREAT Scholarships 2024
eligi: be an Indian citizen
be an Indian passport holder
hold an offer from the University of Derby to pursue a full-time, postgraduate taught master's course, starting in 2024
have an outstanding academic background or relevant work experience
be classified as an international student for tuition fee purposes
meet the English language requirement of the University of Derby

title: Nirman Shramik Kalyan Yojana Scholarship for ST/SC/OBC/SEBC/GENERAL/EBC Communities, Odisha 2023-24
eligi: be an Indian citizen
be a domicile of Odisha
be studying in Class 6 and above at a recognised school/ institution/university
be a ward of a building or construction worker
belong to the General, Scheduled Tribe (ST), Scheduled Caste (SC), Other Backward Classes (OBC), Socially and Economically Backward Classes (SEBC), and Economically Backward Classes (EBC) category
have secured 50% attendance in the academic session
have cleared the previous examination

title: Hartpury University GREAT Scholarships 2024
eligi: be a passport holder of India or China (mainland only)
have received and accepted an offer to study a full-time postgraduate qualification at Hartpury University
have a minimum academic qualification equivalent to a UK 2:1 degree

title: University of St Andrews GREAT Scholarship 2024
eligi: be a citizen of India, Ghana, Greece, Malaysia, Mexico, or Thailand
have applied for a taught postgraduate Master's programme: MLitt, MRes, MSc
meet the English language requirement of their course or have started a 10-week pre-sessional English course by 30 June 2024

title: Sydney Scholars India Scholarship Program 2024
eligi: have citizenship in India
be a current resident of India
be an international student as defined by the Higher Education Support Act 2003 (Note:- This excludes Australian citizens and Australian permanent residents.)
have applied to an undergraduate or postgraduate coursework program at the University of Sydney, but have not yet commenced their studies

title: MSIF McDonald Fellowship 2024
eligi: be a citizen of a low- or middle-income country (including India)
be pursuing postgraduate studies, at least an M.Sc., preferably a Ph.D. or M.D. degree in an area relevant to multiple sclerosis
be working or studying in another country on a project supported by a Multiple Sclerosis (MS) International Federal grant that started within six months before the nomination
have focused their research on areas relevant to multiple sclerosis

title: Aspire Leaders Program 2024
eligi: Open to students within the age group of 18-29 years.
The annual household income of the applicants should be less than ₹8,00,000.
Only first-generation learners are eligible to apply for the program.

Participants who have enrolled in or completed an undergraduate program in the last three years are eligible to apply. (Note: Those who have enrolled in or completed a master's or postgraduate program are not eligible to apply.)
Applicants must have an intermediate level of proficiency in English.

title: Samsung Solve for Tomorrow India 2024
eligi: be an Indian national
be aged between 14-17 years as on 31st May 2024 (for school track)
be aged between 18-22 years as on 31st May 2024 (for youth track)

title: Robert Gordon University GREAT Scholarships 2024
eligi: be a citizen of Ghana, India or Pakistan
hold an offer from Robert Gordon University for a full-time, on-campus, postgraduate course starting in September 2024
be classed by the university as an international fee payer for tuition fee payment
have an undergraduate degree that qualifies for entry into a postgraduate program at a UK university

title: Vocational Training Fee Reimbursement for SC Students, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
belong to Scheduled Caste (SC) category
have been admitted through the PPP scheme to Government Skill Development Institutes or Private Institutes
have taken admission through the Centralised Admission Process (CAP)
have an annual family income of less than or equal to ₹ 8,00,000 from all sources

title: Education Concession to Children of Freedom Fighters, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
be a ward/wife/widow of the freedom fighter
be pursuing graduation and postgraduation courses from one of the recognised institutions of Maharashtra

title: Ferguson Scholarship, Aston University 2024
eligi: be nationals of India or an African country
hold a conditional or unconditional offer in one of the specified degree courses
hold a 2:1 degree or equivalent in a relevant subject for the course applied
provide a strong personal statement when submitting the course application
be a self-funded student

title: Nutanix Heart Women in Technology Scholarships 2024
eligi: be a female student
be an undergraduate or graduate student enrolled in a full-time degree for the academic year 2024–2025
be currently pursuing a degree in software engineering, electrical engineering, computer science, or computer engineering
be enrolled in schools in eligible countries including the US, Mexico, Australia, UK, France, India, Serbia, Netherlands, and Spain
have secured a minimum GPA of 3.0 in nations that use GPA scoring (transcripts required for applicants using GPA scoring)
demonstrate excellent communication and leadership abilities
possess a history of community service and extracurricular involvement

title: The Anant Fellowship 2024-25
eligi: hold an undergraduate degree in any discipline
demonstrate a commitment to improving the built environment
possess a strong academic record and extracurricular achievements

title: Jawaharlal Nehru University Scholarship, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
be an undergraduate/postgraduate degree student studying at Jawaharlal Nehru University

title: Tuition Fees and Examination Fees to OBC Students, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
belong to the OBC category
be pursuing studies at the post-matric level (Class 11 and above) in a government/government-aided/private institution
have taken admission through the Centralised Admission Process (CAP) process (for professional courses)

be pursuing a degree course in Health Science (Medical, Dental, Homeopathy, Unani, Ayurveda, Physiotherapy, Business Aid, Nursing) OR hold a diploma in Engineering, Pharmacology, HMCT OR hold a postgraduate degree in MBA/MMS, MCA
have an annual family income of less than or equal to ₹8,00,000

title: Dr. Panjabrao Deshmukh Hostel Maintenance Allowance Scheme 2023-24
eligi: be a domicile of Maharashtra
have taken admission under the general and SEBC category
be a child of registered labourer/Alpabhudharak shetkari (marginal landholders)

have applied for a degree course in one of the following disciplines in a government-aided/corporation/private un-aided college: Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS), Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS), Bachelor of Ayurvedic Medicine and Surgery (BAMS), Bachelor of Homeopathic Medicine and Surgery (BHMS), Bachelor of Physiotherapy (BPTH), B.Sc. Nursing, Bachelor of Unani Medicine and Surgery (BUMS), Bachelor in Prosthetics and Orthotics (BPO), Bachelor in Audiology and Speech-Language Pathology (BASLP), Dual-Degree programmes
have taken admission in hostels in Mumbai, Pune, Aurangabad, Nagpur, or other locations in Maharashtra
have an annual family income of less than ₹8,00,000

title: Education Fee Reimbursement Scheme for Open Category Students, Maharashtra 2023-24
eligi: belong to open category
be a domicile of Maharashtra
have taken admission through the Centralised Admission Process (CAP)
be pursuing MBBS, BDS, postgraduate medical (MD/MS) in private un-aided colleges

title: Aichi Scholarship Program 2024
eligi: be under 35 years old as of 1st April 2024, i.e. born on or after 2nd April 1988
be a citizen of and currently reside in India or one of the United Nations member states excluding Japan and North Korea, Vatican City, Kosovo, Cook Islands, and Niue
hold a bachelor's degree or equivalent qualification
select a field of study relevant to Aichi's manufacturing industry
demonstrate proficiency in Japanese or have a clear plan to achieve proficiency for study and potential employment in Aichi
be in good physical and mental health to participate fully in the program
